description: This is the main application component for a React-based reservation management frontend. It manages theme toggling (light/dark), sets document attributes, and renders core layout components including navigation and routing.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component that initializes theme state, applies theme styles, and renders the application's layout with navigation and routing.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle between light and dark themes by updating the 'theme' state.
